Package tetris_mvc

Class Pieces

  • java.lang.Object
    • tetris_mvc.Pieces
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfacePieces, Observable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PieceL, PieceT, PieceU
    public abstract class Pieces
extends Object
implements InterfacePieces, Observable
    Classe abstraite dont toutes les pièces du jeu hériteront
    Author:
    kaba
